casebody.data:
MATTER OF CHESAPEAKE & OHIO RAILWAY COMPANY. MOTION FOB LEAVE TO FILE PETITION, FOB WBIT OF MANDAMUS.

Original.

Submitted November 9, 1908. Decided November 16, 1908. Leave to file petition for mandamus to compel Circuit Court to retain jurisdiction of a condemnation proceeding refused. Mr. F. B. Enslow and Mr. J. L. Bumgardner for petitioner. Mr. Edward W. Knight, opposing. Per Curiam:

Motion for leave to file a petition for a writ of mandamus denied.
